attributes.action: recognise and show his support for the principle of ministerial responsibility by sacking incompetent ministers within the MOD for failing to uphold and protect the morale and standing of UK armed forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Incompetence by ministers cannot be excused by glib apologies for indolence negligence and dereliction of duty. The Minister concerned should resign and cooperate fully with public enquiry. We should now be asking whether the MOD is fit for purpose

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
